sentences.sContent: ...The snake has been named silver boa because it is metallic colored and the first specimen found was climbing a silver palm tree...
...I love the colonial fabrics or the silver works...
I need £2 in silver for the parking meter.
sentences.sCn: 我需要在停车收费器里投2英镑银币。

sentences.sContent: They've had to sell the family silver to pay the bills.
sentences.sCn: 他们不得已卖掉家传的银器去支付账单。

trans.tranOther: a valuable shiny, light grey metal that is used to make jewellery, knives, coins etc. It is a chemical element : symbol Ag
